mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (EMAIL, NAME, PASSWORD, STATUS, JOINED_AT) VALUES ( #{email}, #{name}, #{password}, NVL(#{status}, 'ACTIVE'), SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT EMAIL, NAME, PASSWORD, STATUS, JOINED_AT FROM USERS WHERE LOWER(EMAIL) = LOWER(#{email})
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM USERS WHERE LOWER(EMAIL) = LOWER(#{email})
SELECT EMAIL, NAME, PASSWORD, STATUS, JOINED_AT FROM USERS WHERE LOWER(EMAIL) = LOWER(#{email}) AND PASSWORD = #{password} AND STATUS = 'ACTIVE'
